ValidationRule.description: Lock tech sale stage if opportunity stage is decision or higher
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Purchase"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Orders Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Ready to Ship"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")), ISCHANGED( Tech_Sale_Stage__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Tech Sale Stage cannot be changed if an opportunity is at 75% or greater
